variable.name: %%bri_q921_protocol%%
variable.title: BRI Q921 Protocol
variable.info: Select whether the connection provided by your ISDN line provider is "Point-to-Point" or "Point-to-MultiPoint". "Point-to-Point" has to be selected for DDI lines - "Point-to-MultiPoint" for MSN lines

variable.name: %%port_number%%
variable.title: Ports
variable.info: Define the amount of ISDN ports your Patton device has
variable.result: interface isdn IF_BRI_00 route call dest-table RT_ISDN_TO_SIP call-reroute emit diversion emit user-side-ringback-tone call-hold disable caller-name

route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01
route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_BRI_02
route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_BRI_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_BRI_03
route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_BRI_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_BRI_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_BRI_04

route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_BRI_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_BRI_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_BRI_04 route call 6 dest-interface IF_BRI_05

route call 1 dest-interface IF_BRI_00 route call 2 dest-interface IF_BRI_01 route call 3 dest-interface IF_BRI_02 route call 4 dest-interface IF_BRI_03 route call 5 dest-interface IF_BRI_04 route call 6 dest-interface IF_BRI_05 route call 7 dest-interface IF_BRI_06

clock-source 1 bri 0 0 clock-source 2 bri 0 1 clock-source 3 bri 0 2
clock-source 1 bri 0 0 clock-source 2 bri 0 1 clock-source 3 bri 0 2 clock-source 4 bri 0 3
clock-source 1 bri 0 0 clock-source 2 bri 0 1 clock-source 3 bri 0 2 clock-source 4 bri 0 3 clock-source 5 bri 0 4

variable.name: %%hunt_mode%%
variable.title: Hunting Mode
variable.info: Select whether the hunting of the ports should be Normal (Always starts from the first interface) or Cyclic (Round-Robin)

variable.name: %%default_router%%
variable.title: Default IP Route
variable.info: Please specify the Default Route IP Address for the device

variable.name: %%dns_server%%
variable.title: DNS Server IP Address
variable.info: Please specify the DNS Server IP Address for the device

variable.name: %%cloud_connect%%
variable.title: Patton Cloud Connect - Organization Key
variable.info: To connect your SmartNode to the Patton Cloud, enter in your Organization Key.

device.deviceconfig:
######################################################### # # For Patton 1-8 port BRI # Supported firmware versions - Trinity 3.x # # Author: Patton Support # Support Contact: support@patton.com # #########################################################
cli version 4.00
profile aaa DEFAULT method 1 local method 2 none
console use profile aaa DEFAULT
telnet-server use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
ssh-server use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
snmp-server shutdown
web-server protocol http port 80 protocol https port 443 use profile aaa DEFAULT no shutdown
ntp server 0.patton.pool.ntp.org server 1.patton.pool.ntp.org server 2.patton.pool.ntp.org server 3.patton.pool.ntp.org no shutdown
system %%port_number[3]%%
dns-client name-server %%dns_server%% name-server 8.8.8.8
profile tls DEFAULT authentication incoming authentication outgoing private-key pki:private-key/DEFAULT own-certificate 1 pki:own-certificate/DEFAULT diffie-hellman-parameters pki:diffie-hellman-parameters/DEFAULT-2048
profile voip DEFAULT codec 1 g711alaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20 codec 2 g711ulaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20 fax transmission 1 relay t38-udp fax transmission 2 bypass g711alaw64k rx-length 20 tx-length 20
profile pstn DEFAULT
profile sip DEFAULT
context ip ROUTER
interface WAN ipaddress DHCP tcp adjust-mss rx mtu tcp adjust-mss tx mtu
interface LAN ipaddress LAN %%gateway_ip%% %%gateway_mask%% tcp adjust-mss rx mtu tcp adjust-mss tx mtu
routing-table DEFAULT route 0.0.0.0/0 gateway %%default_router%%
context cs SWITCH
mapping-table calling-pi to calling-e164 MAP_REMOVE_BLANK_CALLERID map restricted to ""
mapping-table calling-e164 to calling-e164 MAP_LEADING_ZERO %%tone_set_data[2]%%
mapping-table calling-e164 to calling-name MAP_CID_TO_CNAME map (.%) to \1
complex-function MAPPING_INCOMING_CALLS execute 1 MAP_REMOVE_BLANK_CALLERID execute 2 MAP_LEADING_ZERO
complex-function MAPPING_INCOMING_CALLS_WITH_CNAME execute 1 MAP_REMOVE_BLANK_CALLERID execute 2 MAP_LEADING_ZERO execute 3 MAP_CID_TO_CNAME
routing-table calling-name SET_CNAME route ^$ dest-interface IF_SIP_3CX MAPPING_INCOMING_CALLS_WITH_CNAME route default dest-interface IF_SIP_3CX MAPPING_INCOMING_CALLS
routing-table called-e164 RT_ISDN_TO_SIP route T2 dest-table SET_CNAME
routing-table called-e164 RT_SIP_TO_ISDN route default dest-service HG_TO_ISDN %%tone_set_data[3]%%
service hunt-group HG_TO_ISDN %%hunt_mode%% drop-cause normal-unspecified drop-cause no-circuit-channel-available drop-cause network-out-of-order drop-cause temporary-failure drop-cause SWITCHing-equipment-congestion drop-cause access-info-discarded drop-cause circuit-channel-not-available drop-cause resources-unavailable %%port_number[2]%% %%port_number%%
interface sip IF_SIP_3CX bind context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX early-disconnect route call dest-service HG_TO_ISDN remote %%param::defaultlocalip%% %%param::sipport%% call-reroute accept trust remote address-translation outgoing-call request-uri user-part fix %%line_int_num_0%% host-part to-header target-param none address-translation incoming-call called-e164 request-uri
context cs SWITCH no shutdown
authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX realm 1 3CXPhoneSystem username %%line_auth_id_0%% password %%line_auth_pw_0%%
location-service LOC_SVC_3CX_%%line_int_num_0%% domain 1 %%param::defaultlocalip%% match-any-domain
identity-group DEFAULT authentication outbound authenticate 1 authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX username %%line_auth_id_0%%
identity %%line_int_num_0%% inherits DEFAULT authentication outbound authenticate 1 authentication-service AUTH_SVC_3CX username %%line_auth_id_0%%
registration outbound registrar %%param::defaultlocalip%% %%param::sipport%% lifetime 60 register auto
context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX bind location-service LOC_SVC_3CX_%%line_int_num_0%%
interface IF_GW_SIP_3CX transport-protocol udp+tcp 5060 no transport-protocol tls bind ipaddress ROUTER LAN LAN
context sip-gateway GW_SIP_3CX no shutdown
nodems-client server https://nodems.patton.io:443 organization-key %%cloud_connect%% resource any no shutdown
port ethernet 0 0 bind interface ROUTER LAN no shutdown
port ethernet 0 1 bind interface ROUTER WAN no shutdown
port bri 0 0 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
q931 protocol dss1 uni-side user bchan-number-order ascending encapsulation cc-isdn bind interface SWITCH IF_BRI_00
port bri 0 0 no shutdown
port bri 0 1 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
q931 protocol dss1 uni-side user bchan-number-order ascending encapsulation cc-isdn bind interface SWITCH IF_BRI_01
port bri 0 1 no shutdown
port bri 0 2 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
q931 protocol dss1 uni-side user bchan-number-order ascending encapsulation cc-isdn bind interface SWITCH IF_BRI_02
port bri 0 2 no shutdown
port bri 0 3 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
q931 protocol dss1 uni-side user bchan-number-order ascending encapsulation cc-isdn bind interface SWITCH IF_BRI_03
port bri 0 3 no shutdown
port bri 0 4 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
q931 protocol dss1 uni-side user bchan-number-order ascending encapsulation cc-isdn bind interface SWITCH IF_BRI_04
port bri 0 4 no shutdown
port bri 0 5 clock auto encapsulation q921
q921 %%bri_q921_protocol%% uni-side auto encapsulation q931
